name: Chicken Walker Showdown
description:
----- Player 1 Controls:

A/D(while on planet): walk on planet

W/S: Engage jets (can't fire in jet mode).

A/D(off planet): rotate

Left click: Shoot

----- Player 2 Controls:

Left Analog(while on planet): walk on planet

Right/Left Trigger: Engage jets (can't fire in jet mode).

Left Analog(off planet): rotate

Right Analog: Shoot

----- Extra Controls:

ESC: Exit

L: Reload Level
